prefix_walkthrough:
!!! Here is a walkthrough of a text game:

==>STEP NUM: 0
==>ACT: Init
==>OBSERVATION: It's nearly christmas 2003, and Ludicorp still haven't released GNE. Something must be going on at the Ludicorp offices...

THE LUDICORP MYSTERY
An Interactive Story
by Cal 'Bees' Henderson
Release 12 / Serial number 031010 / Inform v6.21 Library 6/10 

Front Of The Office
You are standing outside a medium sized, new-looking office block. Blue glass rises majestically above you, and off to the east and west. To your north is the main entrance. To the south is the main carpark.


==>STEP NUM: 1
==>ACT: examine building
==>OBSERVATION: The office is a large glass building, about 3 floors high.


==>STEP NUM: 2
==>ACT: south
==>OBSERVATION: The Main Carpark
The carpark is large and mostly empty - perhaps the size of a football field. Surely there should be more cars here. You parked over in the south east corner. The office building lies to the north. Signs point at a delivery bay to the west.


==>STEP NUM: 3
==>ACT: southeast
==>OBSERVATION: Corner Of the Carpark
You're standing in the south east corner of the carpark.

You can see your Car (which is closed) here.


==>STEP NUM: 4
==>ACT: examine car
==>OBSERVATION: Your car is a small black, nondescript saloon. The MOT is due soon.


==>STEP NUM: 5
==>ACT: open car
==>OBSERVATION: You open the Car.


==>STEP NUM: 6
==>ACT: enter car
==>OBSERVATION: Car
You are sitting inside your car. It smells a bit.

You can see a Gun here.


==>STEP NUM: 7
==>ACT: examine car
==>OBSERVATION: The inside of your car is about as exciting as the outside was. Not very.


==>STEP NUM: 8
==>ACT: smell car
==>OBSERVATION: Urgh - smells nasty.


==>STEP NUM: 9
==>ACT: examine gun
==>OBSERVATION: A shiny gun


==>STEP NUM: 10
==>ACT: take gun
==>OBSERVATION: Taken.


==>STEP NUM: 11
==>ACT: out
==>OBSERVATION: Corner Of the Carpark

You can see your Car (which is empty) here.


==>STEP NUM: 12
==>ACT: northwest
==>OBSERVATION: The Main Carpark


==>STEP NUM: 13
==>ACT: north
==>OBSERVATION: Front Of The Office


==>STEP NUM: 14
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: East Of Office
You are standing to the east of the office building's facia. There are thick bushes to the south and a gravel path leads east to west.


==>STEP NUM: 15
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: Damp Corner
You are in a damp corner where the front of the office building meets a low brick building, with no windows, which runs south.


==>STEP NUM: 16
==>ACT: south
==>OBSERVATION: Storage Shed Door
The low building is a storage shed of some kind. You can enter the door to the east, or continue down the pathway which leads north to south down the edge of the building. Dense bushes lie to the west.


==>STEP NUM: 17
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: Storage Shed
You are standing is a huge storage shed. The door out leads west.

You can see a Long Ladder, some Plant Pots, a Coil of wire and a Dragon Statue here.


==>STEP NUM: 18
==>ACT: examine ladder
==>OBSERVATION: A long wooden ladder.


==>STEP NUM: 19
==>ACT: examine pots
==>OBSERVATION: A stack of simple earthenware pots (Plant pots have a hole on the bottom, so can't carry water!).


==>STEP NUM: 20
==>ACT: examine wire
==>OBSERVATION: A neat coil of 3mm wire.


==>STEP NUM: 21
==>ACT: examine statue
==>OBSERVATION: A small brass statue of a dragon.


==>STEP NUM: 22
==>ACT: take all
==>OBSERVATION: Long Ladder: Taken.
Plant Pots: Taken.
Coil of wire: Taken.
Dragon Statue: Taken.


==>STEP NUM: 23
==>ACT: west
==>OBSERVATION: Storage Shed Door


==>STEP NUM: 24
==>ACT: south
==>OBSERVATION: Abandoned Well
At the end of the path lies a clearing in the bushes, containing an old abandoned well, covered in wild plants. You estimate it to be about 5 meters deep and about a meter in diameter. There are footprints in the dirt next to the well - someone has been here recently. The path leads north, between thick bushes.


==>STEP NUM: 25
==>ACT: examine well
==>OBSERVATION: It's an old stone well. You estimate it to be about 5 meters deep and about a meter in diameter. You could probably get down it ok, but you'd get pretty dirty. Besides, it doesn't look inviting.


==>STEP NUM: 26
==>ACT: examine footprints
==>OBSERVATION: The footprints lead in circles.


==>STEP NUM: 27
==>ACT: examine plants
==>OBSERVATION: You're no Alan Titchmarsh, but you think it's ivy of some sort.


==>STEP NUM: 28
==>ACT: down
==>OBSERVATION: Bottom Of The Well
You are lodged at the bottom of the well, your feet against one side and your back against the other. You can't help but think these stains will never come out. Yuck. Below you is a few inches of murky water.

You can see a Fuse here.


==>STEP NUM: 29
==>ACT: examine water
==>OBSERVATION: The water is brown and foul-smelling. You dare not touch it.


==>STEP NUM: 30
==>ACT: examine fuse
==>OBSERVATION: A rather large electrical fuse. Rated 32 Amps.


==>STEP NUM: 31
==>ACT: take fuse
==>OBSERVATION: Taken.


==>STEP NUM: 32
==>ACT: up
==>OBSERVATION: Abandoned Well


==>STEP NUM: 33
==>ACT: north
==>OBSERVATION: Storage Shed Door


==>STEP NUM: 34
==>ACT: north
==>OBSERVATION: Damp Corner


==>STEP NUM: 35
==>ACT: west
==>OBSERVATION: East Of Office


==>STEP NUM: 36
==>ACT: examine bushes
==>OBSERVATION: The bushes consist of some kind of super-weed-thicket thing that trained scientists would not be able to classify. It exists purely to impede your progress.


==>STEP NUM: 37
==>ACT: south
==>OBSERVATION: Some Bushes
You are concealed in a thick clump of bushes. The office building is barely visible to the north.


==>STEP NUM: 38
==>ACT: south
==>OBSERVATION: Maintanence Stairwell (Top)
Secluded by thick bushes, you are standing at the top of a stone stairwell, set into the floor. It smells of damp, and moss grows on the steps.


==>STEP NUM: 39
==>ACT: down
==>OBSERVATION: Maintanence Stairwell (Bottom)
You are standing at the bottom of a stone stairwell. Moss grows all around you. A low passage leads north east.


==>STEP NUM: 40
==>ACT: northeast
==>OBSERVATION: Generator Room
You are in a concrete room with a low ceiling. Thick black cables run from ducts in the walls. There is a small yellow label on the duct. A low tunnel leads south west.

There is a big diesel generator in the corner of the room, connected to the cables.


==>STEP NUM: 41
==>ACT: examine label
==>OBSERVATION: The label says 'Danger - 420v'.


==>STEP NUM: 42
==>ACT: examine generator
==>OBSERVATION: The generator is dusty but appears to be in working order. Looks like it's missing a fuse though.


==>STEP NUM: 43
==>ACT: put fuse in generator
==>OBSERVATION: When you plug the fuse into the generator, it springs to life with a gentle hum.


==>STEP NUM: 44
==>ACT: southwest
==>OBSERVATION: Maintanence Stairwell (Bottom)


==>STEP NUM: 45
==>ACT: up
==>OBSERVATION: Maintanence Stairwell (Top)


==>STEP NUM: 46
==>ACT: north
==>OBSERVATION: Some Bushes


==>STEP NUM: 47
==>ACT: north
==>OBSERVATION: East Of Office


==>STEP NUM: 48
==>ACT: west
==>OBSERVATION: Front Of The Office


==>STEP NUM: 49
==>ACT: north
==>OBSERVATION: Main Entrance
The main entrance to the building is plush and opulent. And locked. The lights are off and the doors are securely locked. Through the toughened glass you can see a half finished cup of coffee (or perhaps tea - no accounting for taste) sitting on the receptionists desk. It looks like someone left in a hurry. The only way out is back south.


==>STEP NUM: 50
==>ACT: examine door
==>OBSERVATION: The main doors are huge glass affairs, with ornately carved golden handles. They are locked shut.


==>STEP NUM: 51
==>ACT: open door
==>OBSERVATION: It seems to be locked.


==>STEP NUM: 52
==>ACT: south
==>OBSERVATION: Front Of The Office


==>STEP NUM: 53
==>ACT: west
==>OBSERVATION: West Of Office
You are standing to the west of the office building's facia. Thick bushes block your way to the south and a gravel path leads east to west.


==>STEP NUM: 54
==>ACT: west
==>OBSERVATION: Bike Shed
The bikeshed is big and dusty. Nobody actually rides a bike to work - that would be madness - but they have a bikeshed anyway. You suspect that employees come out here to smoke. Bushes block your passage to the south - the only path leads east.


==>STEP NUM: 55
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: West Of Office


==>STEP NUM: 56
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: Front Of The Office


==>STEP NUM: 57
==>ACT: south
==>OBSERVATION: The Main Carpark


==>STEP NUM: 58
==>ACT: west
==>OBSERVATION: The Delivery Bay Gateway
A large gate blocks the delivery bay to the west. There is some sort of control panel mounted by the side of the gate. The carpark lies to the east.


==>STEP NUM: 59
==>ACT: examine gate
==>OBSERVATION: A pretty tough looking gate, topped with mean-looking razor-wire.


==>STEP NUM: 60
==>ACT: examine panel
==>OBSERVATION: It's a simple metal control panel with a single button and a speaker grill. Probably some sort of intercom.


==>STEP NUM: 61
==>ACT: examine button
==>OBSERVATION: The button is now lit up - looks like it's working.


==>STEP NUM: 62
==>ACT: examine grill
==>OBSERVATION: A simple metal grill on the intercom panel conceals a speaker.


==>STEP NUM: 63
==>ACT: push button
==>OBSERVATION: The gate slides open, making a nasty grinding noise. It doesn't sound like it'll close again.


==>STEP NUM: 64
==>ACT: west
==>OBSERVATION: Delivery Bay
The delivery bay is empty and unlocked - the entrance into the building is open to the north. The gate to the carpark leads east.


==>STEP NUM: 65
==>ACT: north
==>OBSERVATION: Storeroom
The storeroom contains lots of huge boxes on palettes, wrapped in industrial strength clingfilm. To the south is the delivery bay. A door leads north, into the building.


==>STEP NUM: 66
==>ACT: examine boxes
==>OBSERVATION: They're just boxes.


==>STEP NUM: 67
==>ACT: examine clingfilm
==>OBSERVATION: It's some sort of clingfilm wrap. It appears to be made of a substance similar to transparent steel. There's no way you can tear it with your hands.


==>STEP NUM: 68
==>ACT: north
==>OBSERVATION: Long Corridor, West End
You are at the west end of a very long east-west corridor. Doors lead north and south.


==>STEP NUM: 69
==>ACT: north
==>OBSERVATION: North-South Corridoor
You are in a narrow corridoor, running north to south.


==>STEP NUM: 70
==>ACT: north
==>OBSERVATION: Vault Door
You are standing in a well-lit room with a huge vault door in it. It is currently closed, blocking the way north. There is a small keypad to the side of the vault door. Doors lead south and east.
